definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
Deutsches Institut für Normung e.V. (DIN)/German Institute for Standardization
pinyin: De2 guo2 Biao1 zhun3 hua4 Xue2 hui4
Guo2 jia1 Biao1 zhun3 hua4 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 國家標準化管理委員會

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Biao1 zhun3 hua4 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: The expectation is that this move will strengthen the grass-roots AMQP standardization movement.
sentences.chinese: 預計此舉將增強AMQP標準化運動的基礎。

sentences.english: The standardized production techniques of Stevia rebaudiana Bertoni in southwest shandong was summarized in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了魯西南地區甜葉菊標準化生產技術規程。

sentences.english: Although standardization is not yet complete, it is progressing.
sentences.chinese: 雖然標準化尚不完全，但也正在不斷進行。

sentences.english: Objective To develop the standard animal models of blood deficiency syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立標準化的血虛證動物模型。

sentences.english: Normalization eliminates redundancies in the data and organizes the data efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 標準化消除了數據冗餘，並對數據進行有效的組織。

sentences.english: Preliminaries on the Principles on Literate Standard of Toponym Standardization;
sentences.chinese: 技術標準是企業標準化系統的主體。

sentences.english: The introduction of standardised support for asynchronous HTTP requests and responses.
sentences.chinese: 引入了對異步HTTP請求和響應的標準化支持。

sentences.english: It is based on measurement of learning via standardized objective tests.
sentences.chinese: 這是根據測量的學習通過標準化客觀的測試。

sentences.english: The thesis provides introductory information of the developing history of agricultural standardized districts of Changde City.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了常德市農業標準化示範區發展的概況。

sentences.english: The parts of an automobile are standardized.
sentences.chinese: 汽車零件是標準化了的。

sentences.english: The standarding of sci-tech journals needs write abstract of treatise in right way.
sentences.chinese: 正確撰寫論文摘要是科技期刊標準化的要求。
它們是抽象化的和標準化的。

sentences.english: Which fields need to be standardized?
sentences.chinese: 哪些字段需要被標準化？

sentences.english: The feature of the software is its standardization and uniformization of information process.
sentences.chinese: 系統的特點是信息處理的標準化和一體化。

sentences.english: All standardizations have an effect on the deployment and maintainability of the target infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 所有標準化都會影響目標基礎結構的部署和可管理性。

sentences.english: It provides a powerful tool for standardizing around.
sentences.chinese: 它爲標準化提供了一個十分強大的工具。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
